name: Deep-dive
tagline: A repository for marine monitoring data.
body:
### Welcome to the Deep Dive project page.

Deep Dive
---------------------
A FOSS project in development to support the [Micronesia Challenge](http://themicronesiachallenge.blogspot.jp/).

The [Micronesia Challenge](http://themicronesiachallenge.blogspot.jp/) is an initiative designed to preserve 20% of near-shore marine resources and 30% of terrestrial resources across Micronesia by 2020.

Mission Statement:
==================
To create a free, reasonable tool to collect benthic, coral, and fish species data. Make a tool that can help to monitor reefs globally.

Features
========

Deep Dive facilitates gathering and storing coral reef data for effective data analysis. With Deep Dive, you can upload coral reef data and store it in a relational database. You can provide authorization to limit user access to data, and you can produce reports demonstrating survey event findings.

Development Status
==================
Deep Dive is pre-alph status.
The project is undergoing a rewrite after the first release, the result of which is [Micronesia Reef Monitoring](http://micronesiareefmonitoring.com/).

[![Build Status](https://deep-dive.ci.cloudbees.com/buildStatus/icon?job=deep-dive)](https://deep-dive.ci.cloudbees.com/job/deep-dive/)

![Powered By Cloudbees](https://www.cloudbees.com/sites/default/files/styles/large/public/Button-Built-on-CB-1.png?itok=3Tnkun-C)


Downloads
=========
Nothing yet

Developer Guidelines
==========
Collaborative development is possible using the [Git Workflow](https://www.atlassian.com/git/tutorials/comparing-workflows/gitflow-workflow)

Documentation
